channel.title: education on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in education on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Come dream with me
item.description: What does our country really need? We need to make sure every citizen gets enough to eat, clothe themselves and opportunity to enrich themselves using good quality education, and employment.

item.title: Introduction to the Indian Caste System
LOG 1.15: Rise and Fall
item.description: 22nd April, 2011 Janani’s log; Solar date: 220411.12 Last week I had crammed too many activities into my schedule; attending multiple classes, working on the programming, in aerobics, music group and a Greenpeace meeting.

item.title: My Window
item.description: From November 29th, 2007 Windows can be seen as our outlooks to the world. There are times when oneâ€™s window shrinks to the size of a peephole, moments of fear or hatred.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie ‘Fiddler on the Roof’.
